name: quint
description: Local security proxy for MCP tool calls

scripts.build: npx tsc -b packages/core packages/proxy packages/cli test
scripts.test: node --test dist/test/crypto.test.js dist/test/db.test.js dist/test/policy.test.js dist/test/interceptor.test.js dist/test/chain.test.js dist/test/proxy.test.js dist/test/http-proxy.test.js
